msg: Added warning about 2.3.0 release plugin dont work properly.

author: alexparvulescu
msg: OAK-340 Basic reindex support in the lucene index
- add LuceneReindexHook, a hook that triggers reindexing on any detected index definition change
- tweaked the LuceneEditor to trigger a reindex from #processCommit of the before state is null.
- played with the way paths are stored & queried in the index
